title: AI-Powered Customer Support Chatbot
description: Built an intelligent chatbot system using LLMs and RAG technology for automated customer support. Integrated with vector databases for context-aware responses and scalable backend architecture.

title: Scalable E-Commerce Microservices API
description: Developed a robust backend API for an e-commerce platform using microservices architecture. Implemented secure payment processing, inventory management, and real-time order tracking.

title: Content Management System with AI Features
description: Created a modern CMS using Laravel with integrated AI capabilities for content generation and optimization. Features include automated SEO suggestions and content analytics dashboard.

title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
description: Built a responsive analytics dashboard using Angular with real-time data visualization. Integrated with multiple APIs for comprehensive business intelligence and automated reporting.
